skills.title: Emergency Response Skills
skills.description: Equipped with Basic and Advanced Life Support training, GNM nurses swiftly respond to critical situations like cardiac arrests and respiratory distress in hospital settings.

skills.title: Infection Control Practices
skills.description: GNM nurses rigorously implement infection control measures, including meticulous hand hygiene and proper use of personal protective equipment, to curb the spread of infections within hospitals.

skills.title: Patient Safety Practices
skills.description: Patient safety is paramount for GNM nurses who ensure correct patient identification, safe transfer techniques, and maintain a secure environment within hospital premises to prevent falls and medication errors.

skills.title: Team Collaboration Skills
skills.description: GNM nurses excel in teamwork and collaboration, effectively communicating with multidisciplinary healthcare teams to ensure coordinated care delivery and optimize patient outcomes.
